subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: After being splattered all over Fenway Park one night and flummoxed with splendid pitching the next, the Colorado Rockies are confident that they will have an advantage at Coors Field.
snippet: After being splattered all over Fenway Park one night and flummoxed with splendid pitching the next, the Colorado Rockies are confident that they will have an advantage at Coors Field.
